name: Eynio
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room light”
”Alexa, turn off hallway light”
”Alexa, turn on bathroom switch”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Eynio is a Smart Home application created for easily controlling, scheduling and manipulating multiple smart devices from various manufactures such as Fibaro, Orvibo, Insteon, Phillips Huse, Belkin Wemo, NetAtmo, Lifix, LimitlessLED, GLobal Cache Itach, etc

With Eynio app you will be able to control other devices that are not supported with Alexa by default.
